scriptLines: select2 split(indicator=='Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator=='Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
selectrequiredcolumn split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
indicator == 'Daily hospital occupancy' || indicator == 'Daily ICU occupancy',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
